text: The Rogues of London is a 1915 British silent thriller film directed by Bert Haldane and starring Blanche Forsythe, Fred Paul and Maud Yates.Low p.299 ==Cast== * Blanche Forsythe as Ruth Davies * Fred Paul as Ralph Most * Maud Yates as Vera Verez * Roy Travers ==References== ==Bibliography== * ==External links== * Category:1915 films Category:1910s thriller films Category:British films Category:British silent feature films Category:British thriller films Category:English-language films Category:Films set in London Category:Films directed by Bert Haldane Category:British black-and-white films
title: The Rogues of London
